All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlreadyTakenUsernameException
Exception thrown when a client tries to set a username that is already used by another client.
AvailableGamesModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of a list of available games.
AvailableGamesObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the AvailableGamesModel.
CannotCreateGameException
Exception thrown when the game can't be created for some reason.
CannotDrawException
Exception thrown when the card can't be drawn from the deck.
CannotOpenJSONException
Exception thrown when the JSON file can't be opened.
CannotOpenWelcomeSocket
Exception thrown when the welcome socket can't be opened.
CannotPlaceCardException
Exception thrown when a card cannot be placed on the game field.
Card
This class represents a general card.
CardNotInHandException
Exception thrown when a card is not found in the player's hand.
CardPrinter
This class is responsible for generating a text-based representation of a Card object for the Codex game client CLI.
CardRepresentation
This class manages the visual representation of a card.
ChooseCardsViewController
This class is the controller of the scene where the player chooses the starter and objective cards.
ClientCLI
This class provides the command-line interface (CLI) for the Codex game client.
ClientConnectionManager
This class offers networks functionalities for the client.
ClientController
This class acts as the central controller for the client-side application of the Codex game.
ClientGUI
This class is the primary application class responsible for initializing and managing the GUI for the client-side
ClientHandler
This class offers network functionalities for the server between the server and the client.
ClientMessageGenerator
This class is responsible for generating JSON messages that are sent to server throughout the game.
ClientMessageHandler
This class is responsible for handling incoming JSON messages from the server.
ClientNetworkObserver
This interface has the functionalities of the client seen from the network perspective.
ClientState
This class contains the possible states for the client.
ClientStateModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of the current client state and optionally a reason for the state change.
ClientStateObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the ClientStateModel.
ClientTerminalInputReader
This class is specifically designed for reading user input in the context of the Codex game client.
ClientTerminalParser
This class is responsible for parsing user commands entered the Codex game client's CLI.
CLIViewController
This class is responsible for handling UI updates in the Command-Line Interface (CLI) for the Codex game client.
Codex
The main class with the entry point for the Codex Naturalis application.
CommandParser
This interface provides a standardized way to interact with user input in a command-driven application.
ConditionStrategy
This interface contains the method that is going to be implemented for each single strategy.
ConnectionObserver
This interface is implemented by a class interested to be notified in case the connection is lost.
ConnectToServerViewController
This class is the controller of the scene where the player creates a new game.
ConsoleColor
This class contains the ANSI codes of the colors used in the CLI interfaces.
Constants
 
Corner
This class represents a Corner on the card.
CreateGameViewController
This class is the controller of the scene where the player creates a new game.
Deck
This abstract class represents a general Deck of cards.
DeckModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of the current DeckModel.
DeckObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the DeckModel.
DecksRepresentation
This class manages the representation of the Decks in the GUI.
DeckWithRevealedCards
This abstract class represents a deck of cards that can have two cards revealed on the table.
EmptyDeckException
Exception thrown when a deck is empty.
FullHandException
Exception thrown when trying to add a card to an already full hand.
Game
This class represents the core game model, managing the game state, decks, players, and overall game logic.
GameController
This class manages the logic of a game instance.
GameField
This class represents a player's game field, which is the grid where they place their cards during the game.
GameFieldModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of the game field state, specifically the placement history of the cards.
GameFieldObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the GameFieldModel.
GameFieldViewController
This class controls the GUI scene of the game board.
GameIsFullException
Exception thrown when the game a player is trying to join is already full.
GameObserver
This interface defines methods for notifying a game controller about various game events.
GameRequestHandler
This class handles incoming requests from clients related to the game and delegates them to the appropriate methods in the game controller.
GameState
This class contains the possible states for a game.
GoldCard
This class represents a Gold card.
GoldCardContext
This class is used to apply the strategy pattern on the gold-card's method for the score calculation.
GoldCardCoveredCornerStrategy
This class is used to apply the covered corner strategy on a gold-card.
GoldCardDeck
This class represents the gold card deck.
GoldCardFeatherStrategy
This class is used to apply the feather strategy on a gold-card.
GoldCardInkPotStrategy
This class is used to apply the InkPot strategy on a gold-card.
GoldCardNoActionStrategy
This class is used to apply the no action strategy on a gold-card.
GoldCardScrollStrategy
This class is used to apply the scroll strategy on a gold-card.
HandAndBoardRepresentation
This class manages the representation of the cards in the hand and on the board, along with all of their proprieties.
HandModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of the player's hand in a card game.
HandObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the HandModel.
InvalidIdException
Exception thrown when the provided ID doesn't correspond to a valid card.
JoinGameViewController
This class is the controller of the "Join Game" scene.
JsonCardsReader
This class handles reading card data from JSON files.
KickedFromGameViewController
This class is the controller of the "Kicked from game" scene.
LeaderboardViewController
This class is the controller of the Final leaderboard Scene.
Lobby
This class represents the lobby where players can create or join a game and set their usernames
LobbyMessageGenerator
This class represents the generator of messages exchanged between a player and the lobby.
LobbyRequestHandler
This class represents the request parser of the exchanged messages.
LostConnectionViewController
This class is the controller of the "Lost Connection With the Server" Scene.
ModelObserver
This interface should be implemented by any class that wants to be notified of changes in the model it observes.
NetworkInputHandler
This class handles the input from the TCP socket.
NetworkInputObserver
This interface is used by a class that is interested in incoming messages from the network.
NetworkInterface
Represents a generic network interface to enable communication between two hosts.
NonExistentGameException
Exception thrown when a player tries to join a game that has already started or does not exist.
NotYourTurnException
Exception thrown when a player tries to place or draw not during their turn.
ObjectiveCard
This class represents an Objective card.
ObjectiveCardContext
This class is used to apply the strategy pattern on the objective cards' method for the final score calculation.
ObjectiveCardDeck
This class represents the objective card deck.
ObjectiveCardDiagonalAnimal
This class is used to implement the diagonal animal strategy.
ObjectiveCardDiagonalFungi
This class is used to implement the diagonal fungi strategy.
ObjectiveCardDiagonalInsect
This class is used to implement the diagonal insect strategy.
ObjectiveCardDiagonalPlants
This class is used to implement the diagonal plant strategy.
ObjectiveCardDoubleFeather
This class is used to implement the double feather strategy.
ObjectiveCardDoubleInkpot
This class is used to implement the double InkPot strategy.
ObjectiveCardDoubleScroll
This class is used to implement the double scroll strategy.
ObjectiveCardGoldenTriplet
This class is used to implement the golden triplet strategy.
ObjectiveCardJPatternAAF
This class is used to implement the Animal-Animal-Fungi pattern strategy.
ObjectiveCardJPatternFFP
This class is used to implement the Fungi-Fungi-Plant pattern strategy.
ObjectiveCardJPatternIIA
This class is used to implement the Insect-Insect-Animal pattern strategy.
ObjectiveCardJPatternPPI
This class is used to implement the Plant-Plant-Insect pattern strategy.
ObjectiveCardThreeAnimal
This class is used to implement the three animal strategy.
ObjectiveCardThreeFungi
This class is used to implement the three fungi strategy.
ObjectiveCardThreeInsect
This class is used to implement the three insect strategy.
ObjectiveCardThreePlant
This class is used to implement the three plant strategy.
ObjectivesModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of the objectives in a game, including both secret and common objectives.
ObjectivesObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the ObjectivesModel.
ObjectivesRepresentation
This class manages the representation of the Common and secret objectives.
ObjectiveStrategy
This interface contains the method that is going to be implemented for each single strategy owned by every single objective card.
ObservableModel
This abstract class provides a foundation for implementing observable models in your application.
Pinger
This class has the role to ping the other host to ensure the connection is still alive.
PlaceableCard
This class represents a placeable card.
Player
This class represents a player participating in the game.
PlayerModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of player information in a game.
PlayerObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the PlayerModel.
PongObserver
This interface allows to notify an observer of a pong response.
Printer
This class provides a variety of methods for printing information to the console.
Request
This class represents a request from a client.
Resource
This class contains the representation of the resources.
ResourceCard
This class represents a Resource card.
ResourceCardDeck
This class represents the resource card deck.
ScoreBoardModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of the scores, resources and final leaderboard information in a game.
ScoreBoardObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the ScoreBoardModel.
ScoreBoardRepresentation
This class manages the representation of the Scoreboard.
ScoreTrackCoordinates
This class holds the score track coordinates for each point on the track.
ScoreTrackRepresentation
This class manages the visual representation of the tokens on the score track.
SelectableCardsModel
This class represents an ObservableModel that keeps track of the selectable starter card and objective cards in the game setup phase.
SelectableCardsObserver
This class implements the ModelObserver interface and is responsible for observing changes in the SelectableCardsModel.
ServerMessageGenerator
This class is responsible for generating JSON messages that are sent to clients throughout the game.
ServerNetworkObserver
This interface has the functionalities of the server seen from the client handler perspective.
ServerTerminalInputReader
This class represents the specific TerminalInputReader for the server.
ServerTerminalParser
This class parses the commands imparted to the server by the user through the terminal.
ServerUnreachableException
Exception thrown when the client can't communicate with the server anymore (or can't connect to it).
ServerView
This class manages the retrieval of data from the server or setting options in the server and displays them to the user through the terminal.
ServerWelcomeSocket
This class accepts the new client connections.
StageManager
The StageManager class manages the current stage and view controller of the application.
StarterCard
This class represents a Starter card.
StarterCardDeck
This class represents the starter card deck.
TerminalInputReader
This class represents a reader that is always ready to take inputs from the terminal.
TitleScreenViewController
This class is the controller for the Main Menu Scene.
Token
This class contains the possible token colors.
ViewConstants
 
ViewController
This abstract class is the base for all the View Controllers.
WaitForPlayersViewController
This class controls the "Waiting for players" Scene.
WelcomeSocketIsAlreadyOpenException
Exception thrown when trying to open a server socket but the server is already listening on another port.
WelcomeViewController
This class is the controller for the Main Menu Scene.
